content: rounds of the lace repeat pattern 38 40 42 44 times across round times using either lace chart or written instructions rounds 18-25 repeats rounds 1-8 round 26 third increase round size s * k4 kfb 3 times k3 kfb repeat from * to end of round 276 sts size m *k3 kfb repeat from * to end of round 300 sts size l *k3 kfb k2 kfb repeat from * to end of round 324 sts side xl k1 *k2 kfb k3 kfb k2 kfb repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 342 sts rounds 27-34 repeat rounds 10-17 for second lace section rounds 35-42 repeat rounds 1-8 rounds 43-50 repeat rounds 10-17 for third lace section rounds 51-58 repeat rounds 1-8 rounds 59 4th increase round size s k2 kfb *k6 kfb k5 kfb repeat from * to end of round 318 sts size m *k5 kfb repeat from * to end of round 350 sts size l *k5 kfb repeat from * to end of round 378 sts size xl k2 kfb *k5 kfb repeat from * to last 3 sts k2 kfb 400 sts knit even in stockinette stitch till work measures 7 75 8 8 25 8 5 or 19 20 21 22 cm at the centre front starting from the cast on edge here is a chance for you to customize the fit as yoke depth will depend more on height than circumference put half you stitches onto a second needle and try your yoke on it should reach comfortably to to your underarm where you will be casting on some extra stitches to complete the body dividing sleeves and body this next round will put your sleeve stitches on hold and cast on extra stitches for the underarm k51 58 62 65 sts put next 58 60 66 70 sts on a waste yarn for first sleeve turn work to wrong side and cable cast on 12 12 14 16 sts turn to right side and k101 115 123 130 sts put next 58 60 66 70 sts on a waste yarn for second sleeve turn work to wrong side and cable cast on 12 12 14 16 sts turn to right side and k50 57 61 65 note your beginning of the round marker remains at the centre back for the body of the sweater your stitch count will be 226 254 274 292 knit even in stockinette for 12 30 cm or 11/2 4 cm less than desired length short row shaping for back this section is optional and will lower the back hem an additional 2 5 cm compared to the front length row 1 rs k63 70 74 78 turn work and make ds row 2 ws purl to marker sm p 63 70 74 78 turn work and make ds row 3 rs k to marker sm k to 3 sts before last ds turn work and make ds row 4 ws purl to marker sm purl
